mapper.sql: id,uid, shop_name, icon_id, industry_id, phone, is_phone_verified, telephone, telephone_ex, brief_intro, business_license_id, longitude, dimensionality, is_shop_verified, wechat_account, shop_address, rank, create_time, last_update_time, phone_verified_time, `comment`,profile_picture

t.ticket_id, t.shop_id, t.ticket_name, t.content, t.type_id, t.period_of_validity_startTime, t.period_of_validity_endTime, t.status, t.collecting_method, t.is_retaken, t.is_re_use, t.amount,t.applicable_scope, t.working_condition, t.validity_comment
ut.id as uticketid, ut.user_id, ut.ticket_id, ut.status as utStatus, ut.create_time, ut.ut_id
mapper.select:
SELECT count(s.id) FROM ety_shop s, ety_ticket t, rel_user_ticket ut WHERE s.id = t.shop_id AND t.ticket_id = ut.ticket_id AND ut.user_id = #{uid, jdbcType=BIGINT}
ORDER BY ut.create_time;

SELECT s.*, , COUNT(*) AS pnum FROM ety_shop s, ety_ticket t, rel_user_ticket ut WHERE s.id = t.shop_id AND t.ticket_id = ut.ticket_id GROUP BY t.shop_id ORDER BY pnum DESC limit #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT s.*,
FROM ety_shop s, ety_ticket t WHERE s.id = t.shop_id AND t.ticket_id = #{tid, jdbcType=CHAR}

select
from ety_shop where rank > 0 ORDER BY create_time desc,rank DESC LIMIT #{limit, jdbcType=INTEGER};

select
from ety_shop where uid=#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY create_time DESC limit #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER};
select count(id) from ety_shop where uid=#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM ety_shop WHERE 1
AND create_time > #{today, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ;

update ety_shop
shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_id = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_phone_verified = #{isPhoneVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT},

comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profile_picture = #{profilePicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
